comment: /**  * Gets the reason why the checkpoint was declined.  *  * @return The reason why the checkpoint was declined  */
code: // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- /**  * Gets the reason why the checkpoint was declined.  *  * @return The reason why the checkpoint was declined  */ public Throwable getReason() {     return reason. }

// -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- @Override public String toString() {     return String.format("Declined Checkpoint %d for (%s/%s): %s", getCheckpointId(), getJob(), getTaskExecutionId(), reason). }
